metadata.title: CVE-2014-7199 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MediaWiki before 1.19.19,1.22.x before 1.22.11, and 1.23.x before 1.23.4 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted SVG file.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
